name: NRL
0:
”Alexa, open NRL”
”Alexa, ask NRL to listen live”
”Alexa, ask NRL to set up match reminders”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. r. l.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can listen to live commentary and catch up on the current round results. Ask for
the latest news, draw, ladder positions and team list updates. Also, set your favourite
club to receive match reminders throughout the 2020 Telstra NRL Premiership season.
You can open the skill with “Alexa, Open NRL” or “Alexa, Launch NRL”.
Or ask Alexa things like:
“Alexa, ask NRL to listen live”
“Alexa, ask NRL for the draw”
“Alexa, ask NRL what’s the latest news?”
“Alexa, ask NRL who’s in the top 8?”
“Alexa, ask NRL what are the latest results?”
“Alexa, ask NRL to set my favourite club”
“Alexa, ask NRL to set up match reminders”
“Alexa, ask NRL where are the Roosters sitting on the ladder?”
See you on match day!
